MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the KY2 area of Kirkcaldy. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:34pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our engineers are currently onsite in the local area to investigate the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:35pm on Monday, 05 April 2021
